divs: Sighting DetailsI'm visiting my Sister in Maryland , I went out on the back deck for a smoke at 10:45 . And happened to glance up at the sky . Coming across and traveling south-southeast , was a square object with white lights in each corner and a flashing red strobe in the center . The height of the object was around 2,000 feet , moving slow and emitting no sound . There was no other air traffic in the sky , and it was a quite night . Even with the aircraft that passes overhead you can here the motors or the jet engines at almost any altitude . I had the object in view for about 2 minutes till I lost it behind some trees . At that height the object looked to be about an inch square or a little bigger when it was closer to me . Sure would like to know if anyone else saw this object . I did try to take a pic of it with my cell phone but all I got from the viewer was grey .
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around July 2nd 2010
Summary: Square object with lights in the corners.
